# GitHub Repository Topics

To improve discoverability and SEO, add these topics to your GitHub repository.

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to https://github.com/simcmoi/todo-overlay
2. Click the **⚙️ Settings** gear icon next to "About" (top right of the repository page)
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics below
4. Click "Save changes"

## SEO Keywords (for Description)

Update the repository description to:

```
⚡ Fast, privacy-first todo app with global hotkey overlay. Built with Rust + Tauri + React. Cross-platform (macOS, Windows, Linux). Lightweight, local storage, keyboard-driven. Open source desktop task manager.
```

## Maximum Topics

GitHub allows up to **20 topics** per repository. Choose the most relevant ones from the list above.

## After Adding Topics

Your repository will appear in:
- GitHub topic pages (e.g., github.com/topics/todo-app)
- GitHub search results for these topics
- GitHub Explore recommendations
- GitHub Trending (if the project gains traction)

## Verification

After adding topics, verify they appear:
1. Visit your repository page
2. Topics should appear as clickable tags below the description
3. Clicking a topic shows other repos with the same topic
